name: Daisy Blaster
description:
DAISY BLASTER (lowrezjam-2022)

CONTROLS:

Move cannon = UP and DOWN ARROW keys.

Fire cannon = "C" key.

Fart = "X" key.

Restart game = "R" key.

Blast Daisy the cow as far as you can, maybe you can get her home?

Game still being worked on, feedback is most welcome.

TIP - Try hit the center of the power bar for  an ULTRA blast :)
